qrcode
===

License
---

QR Code generator taken from [there][1]. MIT License.

Usage
---

    var qrcode = require( 'qrcode' );

    var gen = qrcode( 4, 'M' );
    gen.addData( 'some text' );
    gen.make();

    console.log( gen.createImgTag() );


   [1]: http://d-project.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/misc/qrcode/js/
